title: Online Lettering Class
content:
Hi  
I've been trying to find a good online lettering class for a while. Its been very hard to find any class, let alone a good class. Any help or directions will be very appreciated.
author: iarafath

comments.content: I am trying to find someone in the field who does this Ibrahim. It may take a while. Most do correspondence courses via mail.
I see, there are lots of workshops but everything is location based. Since I am in Maldives thats pretty much impossible. BTW I've check out your work, very nice varieties of styles.

Denis Brown has an "on-line" sort of course that is also available on CD. At least this is a starting point:

[http://www.calligraphy.tv](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164954/http:/www.calligraphy.tv/ "http://www.calligraphy.tv")

I will see what else I can come up with.

Thanks @etahchen and @sisterofdream I have tried one of the many classes based on lettering. I just wanted to inform anyone if they are still looking for a very comprehensive course to check out Sean McCabe.

Amazing typographer, heres the link to his online classes [http://seanwes.com/learn/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164954/http:/seanwes.com/learn/ "http://seanwes.com/learn/") very excited about the whole thing. Hope it helps for anyone looking.
